title: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with L&T Finance, Ashapura Minechem, Royal Orchid, City Union Bank on Thursday? - Moneycontrol
content: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with L&T Finance, Ashapura Minechem, Royal Orchid, City Union Bank on Thursday?  Moneycontrol
description: What a classic setup we are having in City Union Bank, precise Bullish Crab pattern on 4-hour chart with N wave formation near potential reversal zone of Rs 115-120.
